item.description:
We are going on a rafting trip!! There are 2 adventures to choose from. The Gap or the Dryway (see below for pricing details)

We will meet in front the gift shop at 9:30 am. The extra hour will give people time to fill out any necessary paperwork and get wet suits if they are needed. Please call Zoar directly to book and pay for your trip. Just let them know that you are part of THE FUN SINGLES group when calling. They will need to know which trip you will be doing (the Gap or the Dryway)

The basic details are as follows, please refer to the website for more specific information.

Both trips run from 10:30 am to 4:30 pm, the price includes a full day on the river and lunch.

Gap is level II - III rapids, a picnic lunch is included half way thru the trip = $92.00 http://www.zoaroutdoo...

Dryway is level 1 - IV rapids, a BBQ in included at the end of the trip = $105.00 http://www.zoaroutdoo...

Prices do NOT include taxes or any additional fees. cancellation insurance is also available.

Space is VERY limited, so please call and book your reservation ASAP.

Hope to see you all on the river!!

Ivone

PS - We are also doing their Zip Line adventure on Sunday, Sept 13th. Please refer to the Zip Line meet-up for details.

As promised - Anybody intersted in camping, please refer to the Camping weekend meet-up for all of the details.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of the gift shop.
item.name: White water rafting
